mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_BOOK (URL, URLNAME, REGDATE, GID, PID, NNAME) VALUES (#{url}, #{urlname}, SYSDATE(), #{gid}, #{pid}, #{nname})

INSERT INTO G_BOOK (URL, URLNAME, REGDATE, GID, PID, NNAME) VALUES
( #{gblist.url}, #{gblist.urlname}, SYSDATE(), #{gblist.gid}, #{gblist.pid}, #{gblist.nname} )
